title: iOS SDK Development Opsylum
description:
Book Description

iOS SDK Development is the second edition of the bestselling iPhone SDK Development, completely rewritten from the ground up to cover iOS 6Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s new features. Whether youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re a first-time iOS developer, or youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re looking to get up to speed with all the changes to AppleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s tools and frameworks, iOS SDK Development is the solid grounding you need to master this popular platform.
